name: cypress.carhire
description: It is used to conduct automated testing for the project car hire. It will also conduct automated headless testing.
author: laiba.khan

scripts.report:generate: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/html/*.json > cypress/reports/html/report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/html/report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --reportFilename index.html
scripts.test:with-report: npm run test:run && npm run report:generate
